home.title: Who am I?
home.name: Daniel Pires
home.description: I am a Cape Verde based software engineer who specializes in frontend development, but also very passionate about learning new technologies and always willing to work on new projects with challenging new "roads".

about.title: About Me
about.description: I live and work in Mindelo, Cape Verde. I work currently at devgo.org, I develop web applications, mobile apps and also i have some dev-ops tasks like deploying web applications with docker and kubernetes. I'm very passionate about what i do, i like to work with strict rules about organization so that my projects can be easily maintained and scalable. So far i've worked in 2 development companies, Chuva and Devgo, right now i'm a team leader at devgo, responsible for a 3 person team that focuses on developing solutions for an associate company. I'm very passionate about what i do, and i'm always trying to improve and acquire new skills.
